segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink and it's making me angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman not notice the water spilling everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting larger and larger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, but the water is a bigger issue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel frustrated watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the drain isn't working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such waste and carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
